channel.title: What bothers you most in a server
channel.description: guys be fucking serious please. what bothers you most about a server? im asking this cause i want my players to enjoy my server as much as possible when i go public

item.title: What bothers you most in a server
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“B2300 T4nk, post:51, topic:335605”][quote author=LilXCj link=topic=431984.msg3184697#msg3184697 date=1271615517]
All RSPS suck.

Except mine, but that’s a matter of opinion, I only develop it to learn more about Java and test new ways of making something work more efficiently.
[/quote]Only care about yourself don’t you?[/quote]

Yes I do. But I do think mine isn’t all that great either.

Read full topic

item.title: What bothers you most in a server
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

I really hate custom items, not the real items, like dragon claws, or spirit shields, but things like owner cape and wings and the white and red amour. I know you all know those servers with like 3000 custom items and 3 players right? They just look ugly.

Read full topic

item.title: What bothers you most in a server
item.dc:creator: @Desetto Desetto
item.description:
@Desetto wrote:

-Over customed.
-Ugly ass client title background or titlebox.
-Edgeville
-Full RS Autospawn
-Overstaffed
-Little Uptime
-Limited Server Space
-Skill capes without the working skills.
-Overkill starter gear
-Advance level when you first login.
-Customed welcome interfaces.
-Colored welcome messages.
-Shops that sell every item you need, make NPCs drop them.

Read full topic
item.source: What bothers you most in a server

item.title: What bothers you most in a server
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Mopar1 Mr Mopar
item.description:
@Mr_Mopar1 wrote:

This is what i hate about 90% of servers -.-

-Exp rates above 90
-Terrible economy
-5000 custom’s
-Lag
-Abusive staff
-Only online 1-5 hours a day
-Too many staff
-Leeched servers
-Small map
-Too many npc’s
-More than 2 owners
-Nothing to do
-Terrible community
-Too little npc’s
-Over powered weapons
-Bosses that drop ridiculous amounts of items
-Npc’s that drop ridiculous amounts of items
-Not all skilsl work
-Teleporting without runes

Read full topic

item.title: What bothers you most in a server
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

ChaosPkers:

if its leaning more to a pking server would you think it should be easier for cash or no? give me completely honest opinions too.

Pking servers are stupid, if it is skilling/pk that is better. The skillers make the items for the pkers to use. Pots, armour, food, ect… If you just make pk that’s boring. You come across the same people everytime. If it is skilling/pk it is awesome, because you have the choice, skill or pk and either way you make good cash and friends in the process.

The thing about private servers that make a lot of them popular, is the fact that they have a good environment, like having a good staff team, the coder takes care of glitches, the rules are known but not in-forced strictly and the people are having a good time and making friends in the process. I have meet a lot of my RSPS friends off of 1 server, I stayed with it a long time just because it was fun, it was an AllStar base which is crappy laggy and glitchy, but I stayed because everyone knew eachother and it was flat out fun to be with people and log on and see a familiar face, that is why I avoid popular servers for one, because they lose their touch along the way.

Example of a crappy server. I was IP-Banned from a server for saying the owners name too many times… He then proceeded to call me a ‘fucking idiot’. That is when Ryan’s handy SYI comes in handy. That guy was the owner and had too many people on his source for him to even get to know anyone, he treated me like scum. That is what Jagex is doing, and that is why they are losing so many customers.

Read full topic
item.source: What bothers you most in a server

item.title: What bothers you most in a server
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

[quote=“ricky james, post:35, topic:335605”][quote author=ChaosPkers link=topic=431984.msg3171962#msg3171962 date=1270510136]

[quote author=krackkid link=topic=431984.msg3171960#msg3171960 date=1270509991]

[quote author=ChaosPkers link=topic=431984.msg3171958#msg3171958 date=1270509904]

[quote author=krackkid link=topic=431984.msg3171956#msg3171956 date=1270509801]

The money its self. Because its messed up, 1m is like 1k.
[/quote]so you want a server where money is harder to get? so like economic too, where every skill feeds off of another basically?

Well when people start off with 100m full dragon etc…thats just messed up.
[/quote]so if things that are way hard to beat like chaos ele and gwd bosses drop 5m a kill (trust me they are really hard to kill in my server) would you says thats bad

As long as it is hard to get cash, then I will like it, I don’t like everything being easy.(in more ways then 1)
[/quote]if its leaning more to a pking server would you think it should be easier for cash or no? give me completely honest opinions too.
[/quote]I wouldn’t think so because pkers need other skills for money also so I would be sure to add the other skills in there. Personally I would make it balanced but what bothers me the most would most likely be EXP rates[/quote]can do that

Read full topic
item.source: What bothers you most in a server

item.description:
@ricky_james wrote:

[quote=“ChaosPkers, post:34, topic:335605”][quote author=krackkid link=topic=431984.msg3171960#msg3171960 date=1270509991]

[quote author=ChaosPkers link=topic=431984.msg3171958#msg3171958 date=1270509904]

[quote author=krackkid link=topic=431984.msg3171956#msg3171956 date=1270509801]

The money its self. Because its messed up, 1m is like 1k.
[/quote]so you want a server where money is harder to get? so like economic too, where every skill feeds off of another basically?

Well when people start off with 100m full dragon etc…thats just messed up.
[/quote]so if things that are way hard to beat like chaos ele and gwd bosses drop 5m a kill (trust me they are really hard to kill in my server) would you says thats bad

As long as it is hard to get cash, then I will like it, I don’t like everything being easy.(in more ways then 1)
[/quote]if its leaning more to a pking server would you think it should be easier for cash or no? give me completely honest opinions too.[/quote]I wouldn’t think so because pkers need other skills for money also so I would be sure to add the other skills in there. Personally I would make it balanced but what bothers me the most would most likely be EXP rates
